alert.note: Alert for Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264 (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 28 at 1:39PM MST until March 01 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Little Colorado River Valley and northeast plateaus and mesas inluding Tuba City, Winslow, Holbrook, Snowflake, Saint Johns, Springerville, Dilkon, Kykotsmovi. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized areas of blowing dust could reduce visibility. Snow showers are forecast to develop late Wednesday afternoon in these areas, with light accumulation.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264
